title: Wanted certain OJs etc. -- Buy or perhaps trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Wanted certain OJs etc. -- Buy or perhaps trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
Obviously, this is a "Seller's Market"..... I think we all pretty much knew this already.  
My want list by player for Old Judges.  I am not concerned with what team the player is on and I am primarily concerned with the condition and resolution of the front photo.
 I guess that makes me "old school" with the Old Judges:
1.  Deacon White
2.  Pete Browning
3.  Bob Caruthers
4.  Tip O'Neill
I would also like to get Comiskey or Tim Keefe that are more professionally gradeable Vg or better.

-----
I don't have any 19th Century to sell right now although I would trade some of what I have for the players listed above.
